mapper.select: SELECT BUYER_ID , COMPANY_NM , ESTABLISHMENT_DATE , OWNER_NM , OWNER_BIRTHDAY , COMPANY_TYPE , SETTLEMENT_MONTH , EMPLOYEE_CNT , BUSINESS_TYPE , ADDRESS , COMPANY_CERT_STATUS , INDUSTRY_ESTATE_STATUS , BASE_DATE , UPDATE_USER , UPDATE_DATE FROM TBL_EXP_BUYER_DETAIL WHERE BUYER_ID = #{BUYER_ID}

SELECT BUYER_ID , TO_CHAR(CAPITAL,'FM9,999,999,999,999') AS CAPITAL , TO_CHAR(STOCK,'FM9,999,999,999') AS STOCK , TO_CHAR(ORDINARY,'FM9,999,999,999') AS ORDINARY , TO_CHAR(PREFERRED_STOCK,'FM9,999,999,999') AS PREFERRED_STOCK , TO_CHAR(SANGWHAN_CONV_PRE_STOCK,'FM9,999,999,999') AS SANGWHAN_CONV_PRE_STOCK , TO_CHAR(ONE_STOCK_PRICE,'FM9,999,999,999') AS ONE_STOCK_PRICE , UPDATE_USER , UPDATE_DATE FROM TBL_EXP_FIN_ANAL_BASIS01 WHERE BUYER_ID = #{BUYER_ID}
SELECT BUYER_ID , SEQ , BUSINESS_PURPOSE , UPDATE_USER , UPDATE_DATE FROM TBL_EXP_FIN_ANAL_BASIS02 WHERE BUYER_ID = #{BUYER_ID} ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT BUYER_ID , SEQ , JIKWI , NAME , AGE , RELATIONSHIP , TO_CHAR(INAUGURATION_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS INAUGURATION_DATE , TO_CHAR(REAPPOINTMENT_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REAPPOINTMENT_DATE , TO_CHAR(LAST_REGISTERED_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS LAST_REGISTERED_DATE , TO_CHAR(NEXT_REAPPOINTMENT_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS NEXT_REAPPOINTMENT_DATE , BASE_DATE , UPDATE_USER , UPDATE_DATE FROM TBL_EXP_FIN_ANAL_EXECUTIVE WHERE BUYER_ID = #{BUYER_ID} ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT BUYER_ID , INDICATORS , SEQ , ITEM_NAME , TO_CHAR(COMPANY_RATE,'FM999.0') AS COMPANY_RATE , TO_CHAR(SECTORS_AVG_RATE,'FM999.0') AS SECTORS_AVG_RATE , TO_CHAR(EVALUATION_MAX,'FM999.0') AS EVALUATION_MAX , TO_CHAR(EVALUATION_MIN,'FM999.0') AS EVALUATION_MIN , UPDATE_USER , UPDATE_DATE FROM TBL_EXP_FIN_ANAL_RATE WHERE BUYER_ID = #{BUYER_ID} ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT BUYER_ID , YEAR , SEQ , ITEM_NM , CONSULT_MSG , CHECK_YN , UPDATE_USER , UPDATE_DATE FROM TBL_EXP_FIN_ANAL_RESULT WHERE BUYER_ID = #{BUYER_ID} AND (YEAR < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') AND YEAR >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + (365*3),'YYYY')) ORDER BY YEAR, SEQ

SELECT M.GUBUN , M.ITEM_GUBUN , D.SEQ , D.DEPTH AS DEPTH , D.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME , DECODE(SUM(DECODE(M.YEAR, Y.YEAR1, D.AMOUNT, NULL)),NULL,NULL,TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(M.YEAR, Y.YEAR1, D.AMOUNT, NULL)),'FM9,999,999')) AS YEAR1 , DECODE(SUM(DECODE(M.YEAR, Y.YEAR2, D.AMOUNT, NULL)),NULL,NULL,TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(M.YEAR, Y.YEAR2, D.AMOUNT, NULL)),'FM9,999,999')) AS YEAR2 , DECODE(SUM(DECODE(M.YEAR, Y.YEAR3, D.AMOUNT, NULL)),NULL,NULL,TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(M.YEAR, Y.YEAR3, D.AMOUNT, NULL)),'FM9,999,999')) AS YEAR3 FROM TBL_EXP_FIN_ANAL_STATUS_DTL D, TBL_EXP_FIN_ANAL_STATUS_MST M, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12*3),'YYYY') AS YEAR1, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12*2),'YYYY') AS YEAR2, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12*1),'YYYY') AS YEAR3 FROM dual ) Y WHERE M.BUYER_ID = D.BUYER_ID AND M.YEAR = D.YEAR AND M.GUBUN = D.gubun AND M.ITEM_GUBUN = D.ITEM_GUBUN AND M.BUYER_ID = #{BUYER_ID} AND M.YEAR IN (Y.YEAR1,Y.YEAR2,Y.YEAR3) GROUP BY M.GUBUN, M.ITEM_GUBUN, D.SEQ, D.DEPTH, D.ITEM_NAME ORDER BY M.GUBUN, M.ITEM_GUBUN, SEQ
SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12*3),'YYYY')||'년' AS YEAR1, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12*2),'YYYY')||'년' AS YEAR2, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12*1),'YYYY')||'년' AS YEAR3 FROM DUAL

SELECT BUYER_ID , SEQ , STOCKHOLDER_NM , TO_CHAR(STOCK_CNT,'FM9,999,999,999,999') AS STOCK_CNT , TO_CHAR(SHARE_RATIO,'FM999.0') AS SHARE_RATIO , STOCK_KIND , OWNER_RELATIONSHIP , COMPANY_RELATIONSHIP , BORROWED_NM_YN , BASE_DATE , UPDATE_USER , UPDATE_DATE FROM TBL_EXP_FIN_ANAL_STOCKHOLDER WHERE BUYER_ID = #{BUYER_ID} ORDER BY SEQ
